Chapter 197 - The Divine Monarch Of Tragedy

As soon as the Wuhuan Water Monarch made his entrance, the clamor disappeared. The atmosphere was instantly solemn.

The woman dressed like a palace lady meekly returned to her seat, and the other yao and ghosts ceased their conversation. When they looked at the Wuhuan Water Monarch, their gazes carried hints of reverence.

When he saw this, Su Yi’s eyebrows shot up. It seems this Wuhuan Water Monarch guy has made quite the name for himself.

“Mystic Master, should I take this chance to ask about your friend?” Tao Qingshan transmitted.

Su Yi shook his head. He was actually curious to see just why the Wuhuan Water Monarch had decided to host this Assembly in Paradise.

The firelight blazed, illuminating the entire ritual hall.

Then, the Wuhuan Water Monarch swept his gaze across the entire venue and smiled, “I’m honored that all of you chose to attend tonight’s meeting, but I trust that you’re curious: just why did I convene this Assembly in Paradise?”

Many of the guests nodded, and their eyes shone with curiosity.
